TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListViewDeletedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击 控件中的"删除"按钮或调用方法,但在控件删除该项后, 控件引发事件。The control raises the event when a Delete button in the control is clicked or the method is called, but after the control deletes the item. ("删除" 按钮是其`CommandName`属性设置为 "Delete" 的按钮。)这使您可以提供一个事件处理方法, 该方法可在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程, 如检查删除操作的结果。(A Delete button is a button whose `CommandName` property is set to "Delete".) This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as checking the results of a delete operation. 对象传递到事件处理方法。A object is passed to the event-handling method. 使用此对象, 您可以确定受影响的项的数目以及可能已发生的任何异常。This object enables you to determine the number of items affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要确定受删除操作影响的项的数目, 请使用属性。To determine the number of items that were affected by the delete operation, use the property. 若要确定是否发生了任何异常, 请使用属性。To determine whether any exceptions occurred, use the property. 通过设置属性, 可以指示是否已在事件处理方法中处理异常。You can indicate whether you have handled the exception in the event-handling method by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果在删除操作过程中发生了异常, 并且属性设置为`false`, 则控件将重新引发异常。If an exception occurs during the delete operation and the property is set to `false`, the control re-throws the exception. 若要访问已删除项的键字段, 请使用属性。To access the key fields of the deleted item, use the property. 若要访问已删除项的非键字段, 请使用属性。To access non-key fields of the deleted item, use the property. 有关 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用对象确定删除操作过程中是否发生了异常。The following example shows how to use the object to determine whether an exception occurred during a delete operation. 对象传递给事件的事件处理方法。 The object is passed to the event-handling method for the event. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/CS/ListViewDeletedEventArgsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/VB/ListViewDeletedEventArgsVB.aspx#1)]

span.span: Technology Overview: The ListView Control

param.span: 执行删除操作时引发的异常（如果有）。

span.span: The exception that was raised when the delete operation was performed, if any.

param.span: 如果未引发任何异常，则使用 。

span.span: If no exception was raised, use .

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此构造函数初始化类的新实例。You can use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. > [!NOTE] > 此构造函数主要由控件开发人员在引发事件时使用。This constructor is primarily used by control developers when they raise events. 下表显示了 类的某个实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`affectedRows` 参数的值。The value of the `affectedRows` parameter.| ||`e` 参数的值。The value of the `e` parameter.| ||`false`。`false`.|

span.span: Technology Overview: The ListView Control

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AffectedRows As Integer
public: property int AffectedRows { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取受删除操作影响的行数。

span.span: Gets the number of rows that were affected by the delete operation.

value.span: 受删除操作影响的行数。

span.span: The number of rows that were affected by the delete operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定受删除操作影响的项的数目, 由数据源控件报告。Use the property to determine the number of items that were affected by the delete operation, as reported by the data source control. 此属性通常用于确定是否按以下方式删除了正确的项数:This property is typically used to determine whether the correct number of items were deleted in the following ways: - 验证是否只删除了一个项目。To verify that only a single item was deleted. 有时, 错误编写的 delete 语句可以删除多个项。Sometimes an incorrectly written delete statement can delete multiple items. - 如果在删除操作过程中出现错误, 但未引发任何异常, 则验证项是否已被删除。To verify that an item was deleted if an error occurs during the delete operation but no exception was raised. - 当支持乐观并发的数据源控件 ( 如和控件) 的属性设置为`ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues`枚举值时, 验证该项是否已被删除。To verify that an item was deleted when a data source control that supports optimistic concurrency (such as the and controls) has its property set to the `ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues` enumeration value. 在此设置下, 可能无法删除已由其他用户修改的项目。Under this setting, an item that has been modified by another user might not be deleted. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来验证在删除操作过程中是否删除了某个项。The following example shows how to use the property to verify that an item was deleted during the delete operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/CS/ListViewDeletedEventArgsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/VB/ListViewDeletedEventArgsVB.aspx#1)]

span.span: Technology Overview: The ListView Control

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Exception As Exception
public: property Exception ^ Exception { Exception ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取在删除操作过程中引发的异常（如果有）。

span.span: Gets the exception, if any, that was raised during the delete operation.

value.span: 删除操作过程中引发的异常（如果有）；否则为 。

span.span: The exception that was raised during the delete operation, if any; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性获取在删除操作过程中引发的异常 (如果有)。Use the property to get the exception that was raised during the delete operation, if any. 如果未引发异常，此属性将返回 `null`。If no exceptions were raised, this property returns `null`. > [!NOTE] > 如果引发了异常, 并且在事件处理程序中处理了异常, 请将属性设置`true`为。If an exception was raised and you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 否则, 控件将重新引发异常。Otherwise, the control re-throws the exception. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来确定在删除操作过程中是否发生了异常。The following example shows how to use the property to determine whether an exception occurred during a delete operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/CS/ListViewDeletedEventArgsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/VB/ListViewDeletedEventArgsVB.aspx#1)]

span.span: Technology Overview: The ListView Control

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ExceptionHandled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ExceptionHandled : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在事件处理程序中处理了删除操作过程中引发的异常。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an exception that was raised during the delete operation was handled in the event handler.

value.span: 如果异常已在事件处理程序中得到处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the exception was handled in the event handler; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在删除操作过程中引发了异常, 则使用属性指示是否在事件期间处理了异常。When an exception is raised during the delete operation, use the property to indicate whether you handled the exception during the event. 如果将此属性设置为`true`, 则异常将被视为已处理并且不会重新引发。If this property is set to `true`, the exception is considered handled and is not re-thrown. 如果将此属性设置为`false`, 则控件将重新引发异常。If this property is set to `false`, the control re-throws the exception. 若要确定引发的异常, 请使用属性。To determine which exception was raised, use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来指示在事件处理程序中已处理异常。The following example shows how to use the property to indicate that the exception was handled in the event handler. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/CS/ListViewDeletedEventArgsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/VB/ListViewDeletedEventArgsVB.aspx#1)]

span.span: Technology Overview: The ListView Control

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Keys As IOrderedDictionary

span.span: Gets the key or keys for the deleted item.
The key or keys for the deleted item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可访问已删除项的键字段值 ( 由属性指定)。 Use the property to access the values of the key fields (as specified by the property) for a deleted item. 例如, 你可以使用这些值来记录已删除的项。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of deleted items. > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅包含键字段。This property contains only the key fields. 若要访问非键字段, 请使用属性。To access the non-key fields, use the property. 属性返回实现接口的对象。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 对象包含对象, 这些对象表示已删除项的键字段。The object contains objects that represent the key fields of the deleted item. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性访问已删除项的键字段的值。The following example shows how to use the property to access the values of the key fields for a deleted item. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/CS/ListViewDeletedEventArgsKeysCS.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/VB/ListViewDeletedEventArgsKeysVB.aspx#2)]

span.span: Technology Overview: The ListView Control

span.span: How a Data Source Control Creates Parameters for Data-bound Fields

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Values As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 获取已删除项的非键字段值。

span.span: Gets the non-key field values for the deleted item.

value.span: 已删除项的非键字段值。

span.span: The non-key field values for the deleted item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可访问已删除项的非键字段的值。Use the property to access the values of the non-key fields for a deleted item. 例如, 你可以使用这些值来记录已删除的项。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of deleted items. > [!NOTE] > 仅当在 模板中使用双向绑定表达式(如模板)时,才填充属性。The property is populated only when two-way binding expressions are used in the templates, such as the template. 有关双向绑定表达式的详细信息, 请参阅[数据绑定表达式语法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca)。For more information about two-way binding expressions, see [Data-Binding Expression Syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca). 属性返回实现接口的对象。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 对象包含对象, 这些对象表示已删除项的非键字段。The object contains objects that represent the non-key fields of the deleted item. > [!NOTE] > 此属性不包含已删除项的键字段 (由属性指定)。This property does not contain the key fields (as specified by the property) for the deleted item. 若要访问密钥字段, 请使用属性。To access the key fields, use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性访问已删除项的非键字段的值。The following example shows how to use the property to access the values of the non-key fields for a deleted item. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/CS/ListViewDeletedEventArgsKeysCS.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/VB/ListViewDeletedEventArgsKeysVB.aspx#2)]
